com.github.moribund.objects.attributes

Interface RestrictedMovable

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Locatable, Movable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    PlayableCharacter
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Player

    public interface RestrictedMovable
extends Movable
    A RestrictedMovable object is an object that can only move up, down, left, or right. This type of object typically has movement independent of its angle.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void moveDown()
      Moves the object down, not back.
      void moveLeft()
      Moves the object leftwards.
      void moveRight()
      Moves the object rightwards.
      void moveUp()
      Moves the object up, not forward.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.github.moribund.objects.attributes.Movable

        setRotation, setX, setY

      • Methods inherited from interface com.github.moribund.objects.attributes.Locatable

        getRotation, getX, getY

    • Method Detail

      • moveUp

        void moveUp()
        Moves the object up, not forward. If one wishes to move forward, use a FluidMovable object.

      • moveDown

        void moveDown()
        Moves the object down, not back. If one wishes to move backward, use a FluidMovable object.

      • moveLeft

        void moveLeft()
        Moves the object leftwards. This method is not used to rotate the object. If one wishes for such functionality, use a FluidMovable object.

      • moveRight

        void moveRight()
        Moves the object rightwards. This method is not used to rotate the object. If one wishes for such functionality, use a FluidMovable object.
